asset.description:
Drag the slider along to change the number of contracts you could buy to determine:
• How many points you will earn your label
• How much money you could make
• The special rewards you can achieve
• The amount it will cost
Earn Points

3 – 4 Contracts
A shout-out on our official Twitter Feed
Cost: £15
Potential return: £45

Lorem ipsum dolor
